TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebEventCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義與 ASP.NET 健康監視事件關聯的代碼。

span.span: Defines the codes associated with the ASP.NET health monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別包含識別類型的健全狀況監視的程式碼事件。The class contains codes that identify types of health-monitoring events. 在類別中定義兩種類型的程式碼： 主要的程式碼，用來識別 ASP.NET 健康監視事件;其中提供相關的主要程式碼的詳細資訊的詳細資料代碼。Two types of codes are defined within the class: major codes, which identify the ASP.NET health-monitoring events; and detail codes, which provide more information about a related major code. 這些程式碼會實為整數，而不是列舉型別，以便進行擴充。These codes are implemented as integers, rather than as an enumeration, to allow for extensibility. 健全狀況監視的事件引發時，它是主要事件代碼相關聯。When a health-monitoring event is raised, it is associated with a major event code. 下列清單識別的類別內所定義的主要事件代碼的類別：The following list identifies the categories of major event codes that are defined within the class: - **應用程式代碼**。**Application codes**. 事件存留期間的應用程式，例如啟動和關閉事件，找出應用程式程式碼。Application codes identify events in the lifetime of an application, such as startup and shutdown events. 其值都大於欄位常數。Their values are greater than the field constant. 相關聯事件類型。They are associated with the event type. 活動訊號事件是一種特殊的應用程式事件。The heartbeat event is a special kind of application event. 它會識別在提供的執行中處理序狀態的相關資訊的定期間隔引發事件。It identifies events raised at periodic intervals to provide information relative to the state of the running process. 其相關聯事件類型。It is associated with the event type. - **要求程式碼**。**Request codes**. 要求程式碼會識別非錯誤事件，提供每個要求的資訊。Request codes identify non-error events that provide per-request information. 其值都大於欄位常數。Their values are greater than the field constant. 相關聯事件類型。They are associated with the event type. - **錯誤碼**。**Error codes**. 錯誤代碼可識別包含兩種錯誤的相關資訊的事件： 錯誤特別是用來與 Web 要求，系統錯誤。Error codes identify events that contain information about two kinds of errors: errors specifically related to a Web request and systemic errors. 與 Web 要求相關的錯誤會包含未處理例外狀況、 檢視狀態錯誤，以及輸入驗證錯誤。The errors related to Web requests include unhandled exceptions, view-state errors, and input-validation errors. 相關聯事件類型。They are associated with the event type. 系統錯誤訊息指組態或應用程式程式碼，包括剖析器錯誤和編譯錯誤。The systemic errors relate to configuration or application code, including parser errors and compilation errors. 相關聯事件類型。They are associated with the event type. 這兩種錯誤有值大於欄位常數。Both kinds of errors have values greater than the field constant. - **稽核代碼**。**Audit codes**. 稽核代碼可識別包含可稽核的資訊，例如登入嘗試、 存取安全性違規，以及授權違規事件。Audit codes identify events that contain auditable information such as login attempts, access security violations, and authorization violations. 其值都大於。Their values are greater than . 相關聯和其衍生的事件類型。They are associated with and its derived event types. - **其他代碼**。**Miscellaneous codes**. 其他的程式碼不會識別事件，但用於非標準的事件資訊的旗標。Miscellaneous codes do not identify events but are used to flag nonstandard event information. 其值都大於。Their values are greater than . 也請參閱如需詳細資訊。Refer also to for more information. 您可以選擇上述的程式碼值，以建立您自己的自訂事件程式碼。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above . 在 `eventMappings`健全狀況監視的組態項目，您可以選擇性地指定事件程式碼範圍。In the `eventMappings` health-monitoring configuration element, you can optionally specify an event-code range. 如果指定事件的程式碼範圍，則對應僅適用於具有範圍; 事件程式碼的事件否則，它適用於所有事件代碼。If the event code range is specified, the mapping only applies to the events that have an event code within that range; otherwise, it applies to all the event codes. 下列組態檔摘錄會顯示設定為處理其事件代碼屬於稽核類別目錄的事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows the configured to handle events whose event codes belong to the audit category. ``` ``` 您可以選擇上述的程式碼值，以建立您自己的自訂事件程式碼。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above .

summary.span: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視應用程式事件代碼的位移。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring application event codes.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值與相關聯的主要事件代碼，表示位移型別。The value represents the offset for major event codes associated with the type. 所有的應用程式程式碼來指派值大於。All application codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式的編譯已完成。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has finished.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是主要的程式碼，且其值大於值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. ASP.NET 會引發相關編譯應用程式結束時的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application ends.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式的編譯已開始。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has started.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值是主要的程式碼，且其值大於值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. ASP.NET 會引發相關編譯應用程式啟動時的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application starts.

summary.span: 識別應用程式詳細資料事件代碼的位移。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the application detail event codes.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的位移，與相關聯的詳細資料事件的程式碼範圍型別。The value represents the offset for the detail event code range associated with the type. 所有的應用程式詳細資料代碼已指派值大於。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生活動訊號事件。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a heartbeat event occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼，且其值大於。The is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 會引發相關在定期間隔中，組態檔所定義的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event at a periodic interval, as defined by the configuration file.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式已關閉。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an application has shut down.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼，且其值大於。 is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 會引發相關應用程式關閉時的事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the application shuts down.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示應用程式 Bin 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory was changed or renamed.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 詳細程式碼中指定關機的原因。The is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown. 應用程式的 Bin 目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示 Browsers 應用程式目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the Browsers application directory was changed or renamed.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定關機的原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown. 瀏覽器應用程式目錄中的子目錄已變更或重新命名，ASP.NET 會引發的主要程式碼和 詳細資料代碼的。When a subdirectory in the Browsers application directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，指出建置管理員所進行的變更，需要關閉應用程式定義域。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the build manager has made a change that requires the application domain to be shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定關機的原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown. 當組建管理員所進行的變更，需要關閉應用程式定義域，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When the build manager has made a change that requires the application domain to be shut down, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定關機的原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the shutdown. 明確卸載的應用程式定義域時，ASP.NET 會引發的主要程式碼和 詳細資料代碼的。When the application domain is explicitly unloaded, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的位移，與相關聯的主要事件的程式碼範圍， ， ， ，和型別。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the , , , , and types. 所有稽核程式碼來都指派值大於。All audit codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生檔案授權失敗。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼檔案，未獲得授權的存取權的相關的健康狀態事件。 is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is not granted. 發生檔案授權失敗時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When a file-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生檔案授權成功。

span.span: This field is constant.

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是與使用者的驗證失敗相關的健康狀態事件的主要程式碼。 is the major code for the health event related to user's authentication failure. 這個事件發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this event happens, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生表單驗證成功。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼相關的使用者驗證成功的健康狀態事件。The is the major code for the health event related to a user's authentication success. 這個事件發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示檢視狀態驗證失敗。

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生成員資格驗證失敗。

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼與使用者的成員資格驗證失敗相關的健康狀態事件。The is the major code for the health event related to a user's membership-authentication failure. 這個事件發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生成員資格驗證成功。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a membership-authentication success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是與使用者的成員資格驗證成功的健康狀態事件的主要程式碼。 is the major code for the health event related to a user's membership-authentication success. 這個事件發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生未處理的存取例外狀況。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled access exception occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼的相關的資源未獲得授權的存取權之未處理的健康情況事件。 is the major code for the unhandled health event related to the access of a resource for which authorization is not granted. 這個事件發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生未處理的安全性例外狀況。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled security exception occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼的相關安全性違規之未處理的健康情況事件。 is the major code of the unhandled health event related to a security violation. 擲回未處理的安全性例外狀況時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When an unhandled security exception is thrown, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生 URL 授權失敗。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a URL-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的 URL 未獲得授權的使用相關的健康狀態事件的主要程式碼。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is not granted. 發生 URL 授權失敗時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When the URL-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在 Web 要求期間發生 URL 授權成功。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a URL-authorization success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼與使用授權授與的 URL 相關的健康狀態事件。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is granted. URL 已成功授權之後，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When a URL is successfully authorized, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視錯誤事件代碼的位移。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring error event codes.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的位移，與相關聯的主要事件的程式碼範圍和型別。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the and types. 所有的錯誤代碼的值大於所指派。All error codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的票證已過期。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is expired.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定使用者的驗證失敗的原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 當使用者驗證失敗，因為過期的票證時，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When the user's authentication fails due to an expired ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示事件代碼值是不允許的。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the event code value is not allowed.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表程式碼值，系統不允許使用。The represents the use of a code value that is not allowed by the system. 比方說，這可能是如果您自訂 ASP.NET 健康監視事件，並使用已由系統指派的代碼值。For instance, this can happen if you customize an ASP.NET health-monitoring event and use a code value that is already assigned by the system.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的票證無效。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is invalid.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定使用者的驗證失敗的原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 當使用者驗證失敗，因為無效的票證時，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When the user's authentication fails due to an invalid ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的檢視狀態無效。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state is invalid.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定的檢視狀態失敗原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. ASP.NET 檢視狀態的錯誤時，會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When the view-state error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示提供的檢視狀態未通過完整性檢查。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state failed the integrity check.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定的檢視狀態失敗原因的詳細資料代碼。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. 當提供的檢視狀態失敗時的完整性檢查時，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼和詳細資料碼。When the supplied view state fails the integrity check, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 其他事件代碼的位移。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值代表未分類的健康情況事件相關聯的主要事件的程式碼範圍的位移。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with health events that have not been categorized. 所有其他的程式碼來指派值大於。All miscellaneous codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 要求事件代碼的位移。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的位移，與相關聯的主要事件的程式碼範圍型別。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the type. 所有要求程式碼來都指派值大於。All request codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已中止。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was aborted.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指 Web 要求的異常終止主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to a Web-request abnormal termination. 當 Web 要求會中止時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When a Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已完成。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was completed.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指 Web 要求正常終止主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to a Web request normal termination. Web 要求完成時一般來說，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When the Web request completes normally, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示張貼的資訊大小超過允許的限制。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the size of the posted information exceeded the allowed limits.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼，是指張貼其大小的資料超過允許的限制。 is the major code that refers to a data posting whose size exceeds the allowed limits. 當表單張貼資料超過允許的限制時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When a form posts data that exceeds the allowed limits, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示 Web 要求已中止。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request has been aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指的是異常終止時的 Web 要求的主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to the abnormal termination of the Web request. 當 Web 要求會中止時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When the Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生未處理的例外狀況。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating an unhandled exception occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是不由 ASP.NET 處理的例外狀況的相符項目是指主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of an exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 發生例外狀況時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When the exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生驗證錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a validation error occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指並非由 ASP.NET 驗證例外狀況的出現位置的主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of a validation exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 這個例外狀況發生時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生檢視狀態失敗。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a view-state failure occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼所參考的檢視狀態失敗。 is the major code that refers to a view-state failure. 當發生這種情況時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this happens, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，指出存取 Web 資源時發生了錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error accessing a web resource.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示 SQL 提供者已卸除事件。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the SQL provider dropped events.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 後期間有已卸除事件通知時，特殊的 「 警告 」 資料列會寫入 SQL server。When the notification occurs after the one during which events have been dropped, a special warning row is written to the SQL server. 此資料列會寫入之前在通知中，所有其他事件，而設定的排清大小是而言不會計入事件總數。This row is written before all other events in the notification, and is not counted in the total number of events as far as the configured flush size is concerned.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示在與狀態伺服器通訊時發生錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an error occurred while communicating with the state server.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 連線發生錯誤時與狀態伺服器通訊時，ASP.NET 會引發使用的主要程式碼詳細說明的程式碼和。When a connection error occurs while communicating with the state server, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and detail code of . 詳細資料的程式碼，且其值大於。The is a detail code and its value is greater than the .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示主要事件代碼未定義。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the major event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用不由系統定義的主要程式碼值。 represents the use of a major code value that is not defined by the system.

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the detail event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用不由系統定義的詳細資料的程式碼值。 represents the use of a detail code value that is not defined by the system.

summary.span: 指示發生編譯錯誤。

span.span: Indicates that a compilation error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在應用程式的編譯階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application compilation phase. 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 指示發生組態錯誤。

span.span: Indicates that a configuration error occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在應用程式設定階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-configuring phase. 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，指出在物件型別或值的還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間發生了錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of the type or value of an object.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生未分類的錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unclassified error occurred.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要的程式碼，如未分類的錯誤。 is the major code for an unclassified error. 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，表示發生剖析器錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a parser error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指在應用程式剖析階段期間發生錯誤的主要程式碼。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-parsing phase. 發生此錯誤時，ASP.NET 會引發主要的程式碼的。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，指出在屬性的還原序列化期間發生了錯誤。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of a property.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 識別 ASP.NET 健康監視 Web 詳細資料事件代碼的位移。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-detail event codes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值表示的位移，與相關聯的詳細資料事件的程式碼範圍型別。The value represents the offset for the detail-event code range associated with the type. 所有的應用程式詳細資料代碼已指派值大於。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示事件代碼，提供者會使用這個代碼來記錄事件的非標準資訊。

span.span: Represents the event code used by providers to record nonstandard information about an event.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要的程式碼提供者使用來儲存非標準的健康情況事件資訊。 is the major code used by providers to store nonstandard health event information. 其值大於。Its value is greater than . 例如，如果期間緩衝處理，將會捨棄 ASP.NET 健康狀態事件新增至訊息頂端的警告，而不使用。但的唯一方式就撰寫這項警告是在資料庫中建立一筆記錄。For example, if ASP.NET health events are dropped during buffering, the adds a warning to the top of the messages without using the .But the only way for the to write this warning is to create a record in the database. 在資料庫中的每一筆記錄需要事件識別碼，因為提供者會使用作為其主要的程式碼和與詳細資料的程式碼來建立此識別碼。Because every record in the database needs an event ID, the provider uses the as its major code and as the detail code to create this ID. > [!NOTE] > 您可以從上述的討論中，看到未與任何 ASP.NET 健康狀態事件相關聯。As you can see from the above discussion, the is not associated with any ASP.NET health event.

summary.span: 識別自訂事件代碼的位移。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the custom event codes.

summary.span: 這個欄位是常數。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您建立您自己的自訂事件，您必須使用事件程式碼的值大於。If you create your own custom event, you must use an event code with a value greater than .
